Product Overview
The NEC LCD P552 TV 55 Inch Large Screen is full high definition, professional rank display ideal for commercial and digital signage submissions with super screen presentation. The NEC P Series provides a top rank solution for your digital signage requests with its high contrast, quality design and DSTS (Enhanced Digital Signage Technology Suite) that contains more than thirty reliable features, and makes these superior LCD displays perfect for nonstop operation in very tough condition. The NEC LCD P552 Display 55 Inch Cheap Screen is reliable for very busy usage and easy to install at airports, healthcare centres, public information and many other locations.
